attributes.action: Special removal of Eric Joyce as MP
attributes.additional_details:
I am a member of the Falkirk constituency yet I am in the position of having an MP who I feel it is unsafe for myself or my family to discuss matters with.

His recent unprovoked brawl needs no further discussion - the person is not fit and proper temperament to  hold this office.

Unfortunately the people of Falkirk cannot recall this person and therefore will have no proper MP representation for over 3 years.

This should be viewed as an unacceptable position in a democratic society.

I ask therefore that a special removal of Eric Joyce be debated.
